# Observed Decisions

## Approach Condition

```{r,echo=FALSE}
library(rstan)

hypers=c('w1_mean','w1_sd','w2_mean','w2_sd','w3_mean','w3_sd',
         'delta_a','delta_b','tau_a','tau_b','alpha_a','alpha_b')

load("model/ap_fit.RData")

smrystan = summary(fit)
smrystan[[1]][hypers,]

rstan::traceplot(fit,par=hypers)
pairs(fit,pars=hypers)
```

## Avoidance Condition

```{r,echo=FALSE}
library(rstan)

hypers=c('w1_mean','w1_sd','w2_mean','w2_sd','w3_mean','w3_sd',
         'delta_a','delta_b','tau_a','tau_b','alpha_a','alpha_b')

load("model/av_fit.RData")

smrystan = summary(fit)
smrystan[[1]][hypers,]

rstan::traceplot(fit,par=hypers)

```
